{{Description|This vessel was specially made for a single purpose. It has absolutely no secret compartments built into it.}}
'''Gambler's Dice Cup''' is an [[Artifact]] in the set [[Gambler]].

==Description==
Every gambler is superstitious to some degree. Many are very fond of custom-made dice cups, for instance.<br />This was her custom-made dice cup. Despite what one might expect, there was nothing dishonest about it. It had no hidden mechanisms.<br />Fate only decides half of one's dice rolls. The other half are decided by oneself.<br />And yet, she never rolled the dice away from the gambling table.
